data.lyric:
[ti:I Almost Do (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Almost Do (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:04.44]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:08.88]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:13.32]I bet this time of night you're still up
[00:18.23]
[00:19.91]I bet you're tired from a long hard week
[00:25.68]
[00:26.49]I bet you're sittin' in your chair by the window
[00:31.03]Looking out at the city and I bet
[00:34.76]Sometimes you wonder 'bout me
[00:38.21]
[00:41.09]And I just want to tell you
[00:45.65]It takes everything in me not to call you
[00:52.11]
[00:54.25]And I wish I could run to you
[00:57.19]And I hope you know that
[00:59.46]Every time I don't I almost do I almost do
[01:14.09]
[01:19.10]I bet you think I either moved on or hate you
[01:23.93]
[01:25.45]'Cause each time you reach out there's no reply
[01:30.60]
[01:32.24]I bet it never ever occurred to you
[01:37.02]That I can't say hello to you and risk another goodbye
[01:45.69]
[01:46.81]And I just want to tell you
[01:51.34]It takes everything in me not to call you
[01:57.76]
[01:59.95]And I wish I could run to you
[02:02.89]And I hope you know that
[02:05.15]Every time I don't I almost do I almost do
[02:13.25]
[02:23.83]Oh we made quite a mess babe
[02:27.94]It's probably better off this way
[02:31.95]And I confess baby
[02:34.75]In my dreams you're touching my face
[02:38.69]And asking me if I'd want to try again with you
[02:46.96]
[02:48.73]And I almost do
[02:51.56]
[02:52.57]And I just want to tell you
[02:57.10]It takes everything in me not to call you
[03:03.36]
[03:05.78]And I wish I could run to you
[03:08.62]And I hope you know that
[03:10.92]Every time I don't I almost do I almost do
[03:23.97]
[03:30.75]I bet this time of night you're still up
[03:35.70]
[03:37.21]I bet you're tired from a long hard week
[03:42.98]
[03:43.81]I bet you're sittin' in your chair by the window
[03:48.28]Looking out at the city and I hope
[03:51.99]Sometimes you wonder 'bout me
data.trans:
[ti:I Almost Do (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.44]//
[00:08.88]//
[00:13.32]我知道 每天夜里的这个时候 你还没有睡觉
[00:18.23]
[00:19.91]我知道 漫长辛苦的一周工作 一定让你倍感疲劳
[00:25.68]
[00:26.49]我知道 你正坐在窗前
[00:31.03]看着窗外的城市
[00:34.76]时不时地 你也会想想我过得好不好
[00:38.21]
[00:41.09]而我只想对你说
[00:45.65]每次想打给你 都要竭尽所能克制自己
[00:52.11]
[00:54.25]多希望能奔向你
[00:57.19]但愿你知道 
[00:59.46]为了停住几乎迈出的脚步 我已倾尽全力
[01:14.09]
[01:19.10]我知道 你定认为我已继续生活 或积怨于怀
[01:23.93]
[01:25.45]只因你每次与我联络 回应都是空白
[01:30.60]
[01:32.24]我知道 你不会明白 吝惜一声问候
[01:37.02]是怕再换回一句告别
[01:45.69]
[01:46.81]而我只想对你说
[01:51.34]每次想打给你 都要竭尽所能克制自己
[01:57.76]
[01:59.95]多希望能奔向你
[02:02.89]但愿你知道 
[02:05.15]为了停住几乎迈出的脚步 我已倾尽全力
[02:13.25]
[02:23.83]我们的争吵是那样激烈 亲爱的
[02:27.94]也许现在的生活 才能让彼此过得好些
[02:31.95]我承认 亲爱的
[02:34.75]在梦中 你在抚摸我的脸
[02:38.69]问我是否愿意和你再试一遍
[02:46.96]
[02:48.73]我几乎沦陷
[02:51.56]
[02:52.57]而我只想对你说
[02:57.10]每次想打给你 都要竭尽所能克制自己
[03:03.36]
[03:05.78]多希望能奔向你
[03:08.62]但愿你知道 
[03:10.92]为了停住几乎迈出的脚步 我已倾尽全力
[03:23.97]
[03:30.75]我知道 每天夜里的这个时候 你还没有睡觉
[03:35.70]
[03:37.21]我知道 漫长辛苦的一周工作 一定让你倍感疲劳
[03:42.98]
[03:43.81]我知道 你正坐在窗前
[03:48.28]看着窗外的城市 我也希望
[03:51.99]时不时地 你也会想想我过得好不好
